comment: I definitely like this bourbon! It’s a very nice blend.
Good balanced bourbon. Description of this talks about married mash bills of heavy rye and heavy wheat and you can taste the nice combo. Easy drinking so good to bring to a get together.
This zombiepocalypse requires good booze, and this is a solid one. Not strong enough to severely limit your zombie evasion skill, but strong enough to remind you that you don't crave brains.
